meanings.definition: The act or process of making changes to something.
meanings.sent1: The modification of the recipe improved the taste of the dish.
meanings.sent2: She requested a modification to the design of her dress.
meanings.sent3: The modification of the rules allowed for more creativity in the game.
meanings.sent4: His modification of the traditional dance routine was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The modification of the garden transformed it into a peaceful sanctuary.

meanings.definition: A change or alteration made to something.
meanings.sent1: The car's modification included new tires and a paint job.
meanings.sent2: The modification to the schedule caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent3: The modification of the painting gave it a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: Her modification of the hairstyle was bold and unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The modification of the room layout made it more spacious and functional.

meanings.definition: The result of making changes or alterations to something.
meanings.sent1: The modification of the software fixed the bugs in the program.
meanings.sent2: The modification in the policy led to increased customer satisfaction.
meanings.sent3: The modification of the cake recipe resulted in a delicious dessert.
meanings.sent4: His modification of the speech made it more impactful.
meanings.sent5: The modification of the house layout created a cozy atmosphere.
